lmdp.grounding.expressions package¶

Submodules¶

lmdp.grounding.expressions.ConditionalExpressionClass module¶

Conditional Expression Class:

  • It allows to create a statement of the form

when (Boolean Expression) then:

<expressions>

otherwise:

<expressions>

author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez (rrs@brown.edu) date: January 2021

lmdp.grounding.expressions.ExpressionsClass module¶

Expression Class

This is a wrapper for functions with domain and codomains pertinent to MDPs - It allows to verify domains and to map arguments correctly - It allows function composition

author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez (rrs@brown.edu) date: January 2021
